comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for spotting the date here.  We'll include that in the description next time we make updates to the record .

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: This is the Burgess-Wright Model F purchased by Sopwith to replace the Howard-Wright aircraft lost  in the Atlantic Ocean off Brighton Beach, Long Island, New York September 10,1911

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: Photo taken at Brighton Beach racetrack, Long Island, New York.  Several exhibitions were held at the racetrack during September 1911.

comment._content: Would this be the same Sopwith that designed the famed French Sopwith/Camel bi-plane of WWI fame?

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: [Would this be the same Sopwith that designed the famed French Sopwith/Camel bi-plane of WWI fame?  Yes  Thomas Sopwith
